AIR.DESCRIPTION: Air effects only trigger when you have the Flight buff.

BREW.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a potion in X turns.

BREWING.DESCRIPTION: You brew potions X turns quicker.

DISORIENTED.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack of this Enemy has no effect, for X turns.

FLIGHT.DESCRIPTION: Reduce attack damage taken by 50%. Reduced by one if you take attack damage.

THIRSTY.DESCRIPTION: The enemy takes 50% more damage from potions.
